name: Landscapes Collection: Desert Clouds Scarf
description:
This scarf is part of the Landscapes Collection. The photograph was taken on a trip to Death Valley to visit an archaeologist friend who showed me secret nooks and crannies and canyons and some of her very favorite hideaways. At dusk one night, we drank beers (which I rarely enjoy but couldn't help but appreciate in that moment) after squeezing through a tiny crevice beyond a rock fall. Driving home, the sun and clouds glowed at me in a way I couldn't help but turn the camera to.

----

Each scarf measures 27 x 38 inches and is from a LIMITED EDITION of 50 scarves. A hand-signed and numbered certificate will be included with your new treasure.

Care instructions: Each scarf is digitally printed with colorfast inks on 100% silk. Do not forget that silk is fragile! Please HAND WASH in COLD WATER for best results. You can iron on the lowest setting to remove creases.

Shipping time: Scarves ship Priority US Mail within the US, and international shipping is sent regular mail unless otherwise requested. Please let me know before purchase if you would like insurance included in the cost of shipping.

----

Please check terms of service and ask any questions before purchasing.

THANKS!!!

name: Landscapes Collection: Lake Erie Scarf
description:
This scarf is part of the Landscapes Collection. The photograph was taken on a ferry ride from mainland Ohio to a small island where people spend the summer floating in Lake Erie in inner-tubes, beers or flasks in hand, riding around on scooters from beach to beach, leisurely drinking brandy alexanders, or simply sitting in the humid warmth that is a Midwestern summer. That night on the ferry there was a bit of rain and a hope for thunderstorms, but the most dramatic element was the light on the water.

----

Each scarf measures 27 x 38 inches and is from a LIMITED EDITION of 50 scarves. A hand-signed and numbered certificate will be included with your new treasure.

Care instructions: Each scarf is digitally printed with colorfast inks on 100% silk. Do not forget that silk is fragile! Please HAND WASH in COLD WATER for best results. You can iron on the lowest setting to remove creases.

THANKS!!!

name: Landscapes Collection: Moving Trees Scarf
description:
This scarf is part of the Landscapes Collection. The photograph was taken on a train ride from Chicago to Milwaukee, a ride I have taken many times between the two cities that I've called home most often in my life. At a specific point in the train ride the tracks run past the road I grew up on and I can catch a glimpse down the vanishing point of some miles of sun-bleached blacktop for a fleeting moment and know that I am close to the place that first shaped my life. I will never reach my childhood house from any train car, but of all of the photographs I've taken on that train route, this one feels the most like home.

----

Each scarf measures 40 x 60 inches and is from a LIMITED EDITION of 50 scarves. A hand-signed and numbered certificate will be included with your new treasure.

Care instructions: Each scarf is digitally printed with colorfast inks on 100% silk. Do not forget that silk is fragile! Please HAND WASH in COLD WATER for best results. You can iron on the lowest setting to remove creases.
